entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Well, you look reasonably sane.
I am a knight of Catarina.
I've managed to track down this cathedral's store of treasure.
It's right over there, across that narrow part.
Treasure...hmm. Always so close, yet so far...
I'm in quite a pickle, indeed...
Hmm... Hmm...
#0Talk-2nd time
Just hold your horses a moment.
I know, I know, treasure is so sorely tempting...
Hmm... Hmm...
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
What's happened, friend?
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Stop this! Stop this at once!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Gods' spit, I knew something was wrong!
Well, now it's my turn.
I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
Rot in hell!
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Close call, blimey...
#0Upon dying
Why me? Why me?!
#0After he betrays the protagonist
Shame on you, you greedy guts.
Shame on you, you insatiable wench.
Shame on you, you rotten cleric.
Shame on you, you rotten nun.
Thought you could outwit an onion?
Well, say hello to the nice giant! He adores visitors.
#0After he betrays the protagonist if they have already killed the giant
Huh? Where's the old giant?
What! Where's the bloody giant!
Just what have you done?!
How dare you! Have you no shame!
Damn! Damn! Damn!
#0Talk-After he betrays the protagonist
Oh, yes, oh, hello, I don't believe we've met.
I'm Patches. Unbreakable Patches.
You seem to be Unkindled.
Do you have business with me?
#0Choose "No" to the query
Of course not, we have just met, after all.
Sorry, I've been a bit on edge. Forget I even asked.
Ahh, but this is your lucky day.
I happen to be a world-renowned travelling merchant.
If you're as Unkindled as you look, you'll find many a useful thing here.
#0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
Ah, oh, yes, of course...It's coming back to me, now.
Oh, I am so sorry. That was my hand, as you know, but the deed, well, that was the armour's doing.
Regrettable, truly. But behold, I'm stripped clean of that unruly attire.
And look at you, not a scratch!
All's well that ends well, right?
Yes, we'll be fine, I can tell, it's that rotten curse, it is, the untidy mess.
#0Talk-1st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
Oh, ahh, yes, now, it wasn't me, but you still deserve an apology.
Just a little trinket. Go ahead, it's yours now.
You should know, I'm a kind of traveling merchant.
If you're as Unkindled as you look, you'll find plenty of good stuff.
#0Talk-2st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
Oh, yes, yes, what can I do?
Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.
#0Talk-After the Decons of the Deep have been defeated
Oh, hello again. Welcome to Patches' boutique of wonders.
Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" or leaving abruptly, without purchasing something
Can't find anything you like?
Well, you could try looking a little harder...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after purchasing something
Thanks, good compeer.
Thanks, sweeting.
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
Oi, calm down, please!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Forgive me! I'm on my hands and knees!
All's well that ends well, right!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Damn, you heartless, good-for-nothing oaf!
Damn, you heartless little harlot!
Well, now it's my turn.
I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
Rot in hell!
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Cough 'em up, every last one of 'em.
Confess your sins.
#0Upon dying
What did I ever do, anyway?
#0After he locks the protagonist in the tower
Sorry, friend.
Be more careful! By the gods, curiosity is going to kill you kittens.
Some places are better left alone, you know.
Oh, sorry, am I a tad too late?
#0Talk-1st time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
Have no fear, there's beauty in death.
Besides, you're surrounded by ladies. Every man's dream, right?
Besides, you're amongst your own. Plenty of company, right?
Besides, you're surrounded by ladies. Every rotten cleric's dream, right?
#0Talk-2nd time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
Oh, no matter, I'll look after things.
By stripping every last trinket off your corpse.
You're going to make some lucky customer very happy!
#0Talk-1st time
Ah, oh, you, you're alive...
Now, hold your horses, let's have a nice talk about this.
I'll come clean, I did you wrong. I didn't mean it, though, not one bit.
You get these...urges...running the business and all... Oh, and I hate myself for it, I do.
You know what I mean? Terrible, really. But I can see you'll forgive me.
You're alive, after all, and that's what counts, right?
#0Choose "Forgive him" to the query
Oh, fantastic! A wily second chance!
I knew you'd understand, I just knew it.
The heart of a lion. A model for the rest of us. A true friend, forever.
#0Choose "Do not forgive him" to the query
Oh, for heaven's sake, no need to jest with a face like that.
You're still alive, and I'm here grovelling in the dirt, so to speak.
Oh, I know! Here, a token of my sincerity. Right and proper, eh?
We're just a couple of outcasts, let's make the best of it!
#0Talk-2nd time
Oh, yes yes, what can I do?
Aren't you glad we made good of things?
#0Talk-3rd time
Oh, hello again. Welcome to Patches' boutique of wonders.
Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
We're just a couple of outcasts, let's make the best of it!
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Greirat has arrived in the Firelink Shrine
Ahh, I see you've met Greirat.
The slinking rodent. But he did me a good turn back in Lothric dungeon.
Doubtless I should do something about that little debt, or...maybe not.
Well, I can hardly believe he's still standing.
#0Talk-After Greirat has gone thieving
Hey, what happened to Greirat, anyhow?
I haven't seen him at all lately.
If you know where he's scurried off to, be sure and tell me.
I need to stock up, and if he's gone and croaked, he'll have left a gold mine.
#0Choose "Don't tell him" 1st time
Right, yes, I see how it is.
Some things can't be divulged. Even between friends.
It comes with the territory, I know.
But if you happen to recall any details, do be a saint.
Do it for old Patch's boutique of wonders, at least.
#0Choose "Don't tell him" 2nd time
Well? Happen to recall anything important?
About where that old rat scurried off to.
#0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Irithyll
What? Gone all the way to Irithyll, has he?
Well, there can't be much left of that frozen sprawl.
The old rat, he's gone off the deep end this time...
#0Choose "Tell him" 2nd time after Greirat has gone to Irithyll
The old rat, he's gone off the deep end this time...
#0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Lothric Castle
Hmph. Off to Lothric, the castle of no return...
That old thief's lost it if he thinks he has a chance in there.
It's not like he's new to this game, what's gotten into him?
#0Choose "Tell him" 2nd time after Greirat has gone to Lothric Castle
That old thief, he's really lost it this time...
#0Came back to Firelink Shrine
Well, look at you. The luckiest man in the world.
Well, look at you. The luckiest lass in the world.
I just got hold of some truly fine treasure. And for you, I'll practically give it away.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" or leaving abruptly, without purchasing something
Can't find anything you like?
Well, you could try looking a little harder...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after purchasing something
Thanks, good compeer.
Thanks, sweeting.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle
Now, just wait, that's the best you can do? Bloody hell.
Yeah, keep those purse strings nice and tight. So tight they choke you.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle
What do you say? Brilliant stuff, eh?
I won't ask for thanks, but I certainly deserve it.
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
What's happened, friend?
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Stop this! Stop this at once!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Gods' spit, I knew something was wrong!
Well, now it's my turn.
I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
Rot in hell!
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Close call, blimey...
#0Upon dying
Why me? Why me?!
#0Talk-1st time
Oh, look at you, you've got your head screwed on correct.
Fantastic. To meet a kindred spirit, on this godsforsaken crag.
Call me Lapp. I can't remember my real name, so let's just go with that.
I have a feeling we're going to make a fabulous team. Oh, you'll see, you'll see!
#0Talk-2nd time
Ohh, in all honesty there's something I should tell you...
I'm...a Hollow. Yes, I try to play it off, but I haven't a clue about my past.
Who I was, or what I lived for. Not even my own blessed name.
That's why I've come here, searching.
For the Purging Monument, said to be in the Ringed City,
where the pygmies, who found the Dark Soul at the dawn of fire, reside.
All I can say is... Those little stones aren't doing much to help me remember anymore...
#0Talk-3rd time
Well, that's the long and short of it.
So, if I completely forget who you are, don't be wrath with me.
C'mon, what else can I say? I'm a bloody Hollow, for heaven's sake.
#0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
Oh, I know who you are.
Great to see you still in once piece.
Cor, I can see why they call this the dreg-heap at the world's end.
...Mangled remnants from every age, and every land...
It actually sort of lends credence to the old rumours.
That the Ringed City rests below it all.
#0Talk-2nd time at his 2nd location
Ah, don't mind me. You needn't worry yourself with this nonsense.
I just wanted to tell someone, and I'm sick of old humpty. I should stay quiet.
Wait, I'll make it up to you, by letting you in on a secret of sorts.
Past here, you'll find the remains of a giant earthen tower half-submerged in a poisonous swamp.
Not a very nice place to visit... Only, there's precious treasure in the thick of the swamp.
I didn't have any use for it, you see. So sorry, I left the whole package behind.
If I get the chance, I could go fetch it for you, but if that's too long to wait, go nab it for yourself.
...I know who you are. A righteous warrior, yes? With a solemn duty, to boot.
Well, grab that treasure, that's as good a duty as any.
#0Talk-At his 2nd location, after retrieving the Titanite Slab
Ohh, look at you, you found the treasure.
Dashing, just dashing. You'll make good use of it, I'm sure.
Now, this is a little toast, from me to you.
Not much to speak of, but bottoms up. To the greatest warrior there is.
#0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
Oh, there you are, perfect timing.
You remember that treasure, in the thick of the poison swamp?
Well, I fetched it for you, as promised.
Oh, it was only a hop and a skip. I needed a rest from old nan over there.
Here, go ahead, it's yours. Maybe it'll help you with that solemn duty of yours.
#0Talk-At his 3rd location, after acquiring Titanite Slab either two methods
This really is a dreg-heap at the world's end.
...Mangled remnants from every age, and every land...
It actually sort of lends credence to the old rumours.
That the Ringed City rests below it all.
#0Talk-1st time
Oh, well, fancy meeting you here.
A true blessing, that we should seek the same place, and find ourselves standing here, together.
I've got the last of my brew. Let's have our own little toast with it.
To my search, and to your duty. And to the joy that lies before us.
All right, then. Bottoms up!
#0Talk-2nd time
Now, I'm off in search of the Purging Monument.
Once I find it, everything will come back to me.
Who I was, what I lived for, what my name was.
And... What terrible grudges I held.
...I dunno, I just have this feeling. That that's the kind of man I was.
Oh, don't hold it against me, I only think I was!
#0Talk-3rd time
Now, I'm off in search of the Purging Monument.
Once I find it, everything will come back to me.
#0Talk-At his 2nd location after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
Oh, and here we are again.
How goes things? I'm rather running in circles, I'm afraid.
I can't find the Purging Monument. And I've searched high and low...
What if it was never here in the first place?
Ah, bloody hell, what do I know...
#0Choose "I do not know" to the 1st query, or "Say nothing" to the 2nd
Sorry, I know it doesn't concern you...
Seeing you all good and well, I...I just sort of spilled my guts to you.
Just forget it all. Like a good Hollow would!
#0Talk-1st time after choosing "I do not know" or "Say nothing"
...What did I come here in search of?
...Damn, stop it, I'm unbreakable, unbreakable...
#0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I do not know" or "Say nothing"
...Ahh, please, someone tell me...
..Who am I? Why am I here?
#0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
Are you certain of that?
No, sorry, I know you'd never lie to me.
Thank you, thank you kindly. I'll speed right on over.
...It won't be long now, before I know everything.
Who I was, what I lived for, and what my name was.
And I'll have you to thank for it all.
#0Talk-1st time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
Ahh, thank you, most sincerely.
I swear upon my birth name.
That I am your friend. No matter what might come out, no matter what I was.
If you would do me the honour, allow me to be a true friend, always.
#0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
...It won't be long now, before I know everything.
Who I was, what I lived for, and what my name was.
And I'll have you to thank for it all.
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
What's wrong, friend?
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Stop it! Oh, please!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Bloody hell! Lost your mind, have you?
Then I have no choice! Forgive me!
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Forgive me, friend.
I cannot die just yet.
#0Upon dying
Perhaps...I deserved this...
#0Talk-1st time at his 3rd location
Oh, finally, you've come.
Now I know exactly who I was. And for that, I've a little thanks to be giving.
Go this way, and peep past the broken staircase. Some awfully fine treasure's just sitting there all alone.
It'll change your life...
#0Talk-2nd time at his 3rd location
I've much to thank you for, so I'll say it again and again.
Go this way, and peep past the broken staircase. Some awfully fine treasure's just sitting there all alone.
What, don't you believe me?
#0After approaching the ledge, where he shoves the protagonist
Every age, it seems, is tainted by the greed of men.
Rubbish, to one such as I, devoid of all worldly wants!
Hmmm, I dunno, maybe it's just the way we are.
I'll stick you in my prayers. A fine dark soul, to you.
#0Upon being attacked-1st time at his 3rd location
What in bloody hell?
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time at his 3rd location
Stop that! Enough of that!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile at his 3rd location
Bloody hell, you've lost your head, have you?
Then, let's have a go, shall we.
I'm unbreakable! You can't crack me!
I'll rot yer flesh!
#0Upon killing the protagonist at his 3rd location
Everything always goes to pot, doesn't it...
#0Upon dying at his 3rd location
Curses, of all the luck...
Everything always goes to pot, doesn't it...
##Oh come on, you know it's true!
##Gods' piss, just my bloody luck...
##Gods' spit and piss and blood...
##Oh, wait, I forgot to give you a wee warning.
##Watch out for the Dark Spirit lurking at the earthen tower.
##I'm hollow, so it won't bother me, but you're still human, I presume?
##Hmm, must be nice. Really, must be nice!
##True friends, eh?
